page.title: 07AN AUTHOR AND A WEATHER LADY
page.content: We interviewed a man and his wife. He writes books and she records the weather. THE WRITER-The first book he published was in 1940. He writes gardening and wildlife books, he has published seven books now. He writes the books on a word processor, he wrote all our names on the machine and the printer printed them for us. The first book he wrote cost 12 1/2p or 2/6 in old money. THE WEATHER RECORDER-She records the weather for the metereological office. She records rainfall, wind and sunshine.She has to go out at 9.00 in the summer and 10.00 in the winter. She has many books of weather records because she has been recording since 1959. In their garden is a 38 foot deep well which never dries up.
